scenario: XYZ Corp incurred the following expenses: Bribes: $8,537.10, Personal Lunch: $7,263.15, Office Rent: $8,468.68.
question: Calculate the total deductible trade or business expenses under I.R.C. § 162.
answer_explanation: Only ordinary and necessary business expenses are deductible. Fines, bribes, and personal expenses are not. Total: $8,468.68.
